Web Resource Annotation. Dimensions

Sources 
•  Source type 
•  Text: HTML, XML, PDF, etc. 
•  Multimedia: images, video, audio 
•  Web Services

•  Dynamic: databases and forms

changes in the sources)

•  Robustness 
•  Auto-adaptivity 
•  Annotation Supervision

•  Supervised (semi-automatic) 
•  Unsupervised (automatic)
